title: I told you I didn't cheat! Hallelujah..
body:
http://prntscr.com/jxsfkz

After collecting so much information from the boards community,

Being persistent with all the data and counter proof I demonstrated

I got my account un-suspended due to an error on their end.

Thank you all who were involved and shared your knowledge with me in helping appeal for my account.

I almost couldn't have done it with out you.
